title: Piano Lamp, "Model 404", 1928
creditline: Museum purchase from the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Funds
description: Lamp composed of geometric elements: horizontally mounted cylindrical bulb cover on rod as adjustable arm with chromed metal ball counterweight at back; low circular base; bakelite electrical fittings.

exhibitions.title: Nancy and Edwin Marks Collection Gallery: Treasures from the Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Piano Lamp, "Model 404", 1928.
1928. Metal, chrome-plated metal, bakelite. Museum purchase from the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Funds. 1994-71-21.
